briefdescription.para: Type of alarm (temperature, sensor error, etc.)
Whether alarm is active in configuration.
Constructor for creating a new alarm.

detaileddescription.para: Constructor - Creates a new alarm instance.

type
The type of alarm being created
source
Pointer to the measurement point that triggered this alarm
priority
Priority level for this alarm (default: PRIORITY_MEDIUM)
The alarm is created in NEW stage and timestamp is set to current time
type
Type of alarm being created
source
Pointer to measurement point that triggered the alarm
priority
Priority level for the alarm
Initializes alarm with NEW stage, current timestamp, and default timeouts. Generates configuration key and logs alarm creation event.
Ensures proper cleanup of alarm resources
Logs alarm destruction event and outputs debug information

simplesect.para: AlarmType The type of this alarm
AlarmStage The current lifecycle stage
AlarmPriority The priority level of this alarm
MeasurementPoint* Pointer to the measurement point that triggered this alarm
unsigned long Timestamp when alarm was created (millis)
unsigned long Timestamp when alarm was acknowledged (millis)
unsigned long Timestamp when alarm condition was cleared (millis)
String Human-readable alarm description

briefdescription.para: Check if alarm is currently active.

simplesect.para: bool True if alarm is in ACTIVE or ACKNOWLEDGED stage

briefdescription.para: Check if alarm has been acknowledged.

simplesect.para: bool True if alarm is in ACKNOWLEDGED or CLEARED stage
bool True if alarm is in RESOLVED stage

detaileddescription.para: Transitions alarm to ACKNOWLEDGED stage, indicating operator awareness
Transitions alarm from NEW or ACTIVE stage to ACKNOWLEDGED stage. Records acknowledgment timestamp and logs the event.
Marks that the triggering condition has been resolved
Transitions alarm to RESOLVED stage, indicating full resolution
Used when alarm condition returns before full resolution

briefdescription.para: Update alarm condition based on current measurement.

detaileddescription.para:
bool True if alarm condition has changed
Checks current measurement point values against alarm thresholds

briefdescription.para: Get formatted display text for UI.

simplesect.para: String Human-readable text for display interfaces
String Current alarm status as text

parameterdescription.para: Delay time in milliseconds before auto-resolution

simplesect.para: unsigned long Current delay time in milliseconds

briefdescription.para: Check if the alarm delay period has elapsed.

simplesect.para: bool True if delay time has passed since alarm creation

briefdescription.para: Less-than comparison operator for alarm sorting.

simplesect.para: bool True if this alarm has lower priority/older timestamp
bool True if alarms are equivalent
String Human-readable alarm type description
String Human-readable alarm stage description

briefdescription.para: Get the configuration key for this alarm.

simplesect.para: String Configuration key in format "alarm_<point>_<type>"

briefdescription.para: Check if alarm is enabled in configuration.

simplesect.para: bool True if alarm is active in system configuration

parameterdescription.para: True to enable, false to disable

simplesect.para: uint8_t Address of associated measurement point (255 if no source)

parameterdescription.para: New priority level for this alarm

briefdescription.para: Set the hysteresis value for alarm triggering.

parameterdescription.para: Hysteresis value to prevent alarm flapping

simplesect.para: int16_t Current hysteresis setting

parameterdescription.para: Time in milliseconds before auto-resolution after acknowledgment

simplesect.para: unsigned long Current acknowledged delay in milliseconds

briefdescription.para: Check if acknowledged delay has elapsed.

simplesect.para: bool True if acknowledged delay period has passed
unsigned long Milliseconds remaining in acknowledged delay

detaileddescription.para: Generates human-readable message based on current alarm state

briefdescription.para: Check if alarm condition is currently met.

simplesect.para: bool True if triggering condition is present
String Priority level as text

briefdescription.para: Get priority as string with parameter.

simplesect.para: String Priority level as text

briefdescription.para: Main alarm class for temperature monitoring system.

detaileddescription.para: Manages individual alarm instances with full lifecycle tracking, priority handling, and integration with measurement points
